text: Q.2 In a data link protocol, the following character encoding is used: A - 01000111, B - 11100011, FLAG - 01111110, ESC - 11100000 Assuming that byte stuffing is employed for the four character frame A B ESC FLAG, transmitter sends it as e 01111110 01000111 11100011 11100000 11100000 01111110 9 01111110 01000111 11100011 11100000 11100000 01111110 01111110 o 01111110 01000111 11100011 11100000 11100000 11100000 01111110 01111110 Q None of these VIEW Anwser || COPY || MARK
